lead_paragraph: Injured Paris St Germain striker Edinson Cavani rejected an offer to stay in France to recover from a thigh injury and is fighting to be fit for Uruguay's World Cup qualifier at home to Ecuador, national team coach Oscar Tabarez said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Uruguay Hopeful Cavani Will Be Fit to Face Ecuador
headline.main: Uruguay Hopeful Cavani Will Be Fit to Face Ecuador

snippet: Injured Paris St Germain striker Edinson Cavani rejected an offer to stay in France to recover from a thigh injury and is fighting to be fit for Uruguay's World Cup qualifier at home to Ecuador, national team coach Oscar Tabarez said on Monday....
